startURLs.title: Start URLs
startURLs.description: List of URLs that will be scraped or crawled. It can be the main website URL, (sub-)category URLs or product URLs.

maxItems.title: Max items
maxItems.description: Limit of product pages to be scraped

extendOutputFunction.title: Extend output function
extendOutputFunction.description: A function which result will get merged with the default result. It must return an object.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: The best option is usually Automatic proxy, but you can also use your own proxies or no proxy. Proxy's country defaults to 'US'.
